comments:
I am new to EMF but not to Eclipse. I am using eclipse.buildId=I200406251208.
I am going through the tutorial "Generating an EMF Model using XML Schema (XSD)"
at
http://dev.eclipse.org/viewcvs/indextools.cgi/org.eclipse.emf/doc/org.eclipse.emf.doc/tutorials/xlibmod/xlibmod.html?rev=1.6

When I load the libray.xsd I get the error below. I tried several other xsd and
got the same error. I assume there is something wrong with my installation but
could not find an info search the eclipse site.

John, have you followed the instructions highlighted in bright yellow at the top
of the download page which are necessary to follow if you are using a Sun JDK
and are trying to load schemas?  This is also discussed in the FAQ:

http://download.eclipse.org/tools/emf/scripts/faq.php?FAQ=EMF#newbie20040205-1770726049
